full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 751 Filed 08/10/22 Page 90 of 261 1251
LC6Cmax3
Kate - cross
1 Q. Do you collect monies from insurance by your clients?
2 A. No.
3 Q. It is all cash or check?
4 A. Yes.
5 Q. Now, you've testified that there was a period of time, I think upwards of ten years, that you used drugs; correct?
6 
7 A. Yes.
8 Q. You used cocaine; correct?
9 A. Yes.
10 Q. You used sleeping pills; correct?
11 A. Yes.
12 Q. And you also used alcohol; correct?
13 A. Yes.
14 Q. And it is your testimony that you abused those substances; correct?
15 
16 A. Yes.
17 Q. To the point where, after approximately ten years of use, you decided you no longer wanted to engage in that; correct?
18 
19 A. Yes.
20 Q. And you have lived a sober life since then; correct?
21 A. Yes, I have.
22 Q. And that, in part, is what you were promoting with your foundation, weren't you?
23 
24 A. I would say it's what we're attracting, not what we're promoting.
25 
SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C.
(212) 805-0300
DOJ-OGR-00012841

1 Q. Do you collect monies from insurance by your clients?
2 A. No.
3 Q. It is all cash or check?
4 A. Yes.
5 Q. Now, you've testified that there was a period of time, I think upwards of ten years, that you used drugs; correct?
6 
7 A. Yes.
8 Q. You used cocaine; correct?
9 A. Yes.

11 A. Yes.

15

17 Q. To the point where, after approximately ten years of use, you decided you no longer wanted to engage in that; correct?
18 
19 A. Yes.
20 Q. And you have lived a sober life since then; correct?
21 A. Yes, I have.
22 Q. And that, in part, is what you were promoting with your foundation, weren't you?
23 
24 A. I would say it's what we're attracting, not what we're promoting.
25

additional_notes: The document appears to be a court transcript with a clear Q&A format. There is some handwritten notation in the margin. The document is well-formatted and legible.
